originalText.text: Very professional team! They handled my matter from the beginning to the end! Great communication! I'm very lucky to find this firm! Very satisfied! I recommended these guys to many of my friends! They do help with all types of issues!

text.text: Very professional team! They handled my matter from the beginning to the end! Great communication! I'm very lucky to find this firm! Very satisfied! I recommended these guys to many of my friends! They do help with all types of issues!

originalText.text: I paid $250 to discuss my case and spoke to a female name Marissa I think and she said that they could take my case and to think about it so I did. She called back like 5 days later asking me if I made up my mind and I said I needed to rule out some other possibilities. So I did that and when I called back the following week they initially answered the phone but the guy that did acted hesitant and I asked for the lady to call me back about the case. No one ever did. I called them and they picked up the phone and hung up and I thought it was an accident so I called again and they did the same thing. So very rude, not professional and not responsive after I had paid them.

originalText.text: My question was solved quickly and competently

text.text: My question was solved quickly and competently

originalText.text: Рекомендую адвоката этой компании, ответственный и надёжный, очень нам помог в судебном разбирательстве, грамотный, консультировал нас в течение всего процесса, был с нами на связи. Благодарим от всего сердца.

text.text: I recommend the lawyer of this company, responsible and reliable, he helped us a lot in the trial, competent, advised us throughout the entire process, and was in touch with us. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts.
